summary: Running low on female HDT mods? got ya covered. This mod changes all of vanilla female hairs ( including Beasts support yay! ) with HDT onesFor those who are confused,  it should work with textures replacers but not meshes replacers.Requirements- SKSE- HDT Physics- 1.9.32.0v- A brain

Would love to see your pictures or videos with this mod.

If you are having "the helmet glitch" try this fix [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88223/]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88223/[/url]

If anyone have any problem with this mod, send me a message [/size][url=https://twitter.com/Kaidra_OE][size=6]https://twitter.com/Kaidra_OE[/size][/url][size=6].
